room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: One of the best 49 minutes ever. Loved doing this with the family and we Broke out! We will be back again. Thinking about taking my team at work too for a team building excercise

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We decided to do a girls' night out at Breakout St. Louis. What a fun hour. We made it with only two minutes to spare, thanks to our Team Leader Austin. I would highly recommend Breakout Games. A great break in routine and opportunity to engage with friends.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Had a wonderful time! Staff was friendly and helpful! Canâ€™t wait to go back and try to escape from every room!

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Private rooms: you can reserve a room for you and one other person, and not pay extra to do so. You get a price break per person over two (or three?) people, but the concept here is built around individual parties. Clean. The 'unseen person that helps' was just the right amount of helpful: not too chatty, not letting us drown in confusion. Good times.

room_title: Escape room "Runaway Train" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: This is a truly unique experience doing the puzzles to break out of a room. We had a great time! There was 6 in our group and that seemed perfect...each person contributed and saw things differently.
